system.description:
An enchantment to gently reduce the temperature of an object. It works best on objects with high proportions of water such as organic creatures. Azure Hand is a good treatment for sunstroke and can deaden pain. Touch is required.

Effects vary according to the subject's health and condition. In general, Azure Hand allows an immediate bonus Healing Roll (see: Physician 2).

 

Bonus Effects

CML70+Victim may be made to suffer frostbite of impact: 1d6 (MS) or 3d6 (CS) to the body part touched. Impact is reduced by armour or clothing.

 

Time: 15-CSI seconds

Range: Touch

Duration: None
